name: Fair isle headband

100% merino wool - hand wash cold and dry flat.

Hand made to order - please allow 14 days for your headband to be knitted and sent to you.

Chunky knitted pom pom bobble hat. Handmade from 100% merino wool and super warm!

The pom pom hat is 11 inches high including pom pom and is slightly slouchy fit.

Handwash. Dry flat and iron on a medium heat.

Please note this item is handmade to order - please allow up to 14 days for the item to be shipped from receipt of payment.

Please note this item is handmade to order - please allow up to 14 days for the item to be shipped from receipt of payment.

name: Knitting patterns - printed
description: Please select the style of knitting pattern you would like to order from the drop down menu and a hard copy of the pattern will be posted to you. If you would prefer to order the pattern as a downloadable PDF file pease visit the individual pattern listing in the knitting patterns section.

name: PDF pattern - fingerless mitts
description: These mitts are super cosy and a perfect easy glove make. The pattern contains instructions to make the gloves in either stocking stitch or moss stitch. The finished mitts measure 7.5 inches length (both styles). When you purchase the pattern you will be sent a link to download the PDF pattern automatically. Pattern is knitted up in super chunky yarn and you will also need a pair of 8mm needles for both styles of gloves and a wool needle. If you are making the stocking stitch mitts you will also need a pair of 7.5mm needles. You can also purchase the mitts ready made here. Terms: Please note this pattern is for your personal use only and to make as gifts. This pattern is an original design by Miss Knit Nat and the pattern or finished items are not to be distributed or sold in whole or in part. No returns or refunds on PDF patterns due to the nature of the digital product.

name: PDF pattern - pom pom hat
description: Make your own Miss Knit Nat chunky pom pom hat! Super cosy and warm – pattern contains instructions for hat with pom pom, or a longer beanie hat without pom pom. This pattern makes a great beginner hat or first knitting in the round project - you could probably knit this up over a couple of evenings or a weekend (a few hours even if you really want to get those needles clicking!) The finished pom pom hat is 11 inches high including pom pom and is slightly slouchy fit. When you purchase the pattern you will be sent a link to download the PDF pattern automatically. Pattern is knitted up in super chunky yarn and you will also need a set of 10mm double pointed needles, a pom pom maker (or circles of card!) and a wool needle. You can also purchase the hat ready made here. Terms: Please note this pattern is for your personal use only and to make as gifts. This pattern is an original design by Miss Knit Nat and the pattern or finished items are not to be distributed or sold in whole or in part. No returns or refunds on PDF patterns due to the nature of the digital product.

name: PDF knitting pattern - moss stitch snoods
description: Make your own Miss Knit Nat moss stitch snood! Super cosy and warm – pattern contains instructions for single moss stitch snood, longer double wrap snood, and also double wrap snood with rib hem. This pattern is a perfect beginner snood pattern or first knitting in the round project. When you purchase the pattern you will be sent a link to download the PDF pattern automatically. Pattern is knitted up in super chunky yarn and you will also need a set of 10mm circular needles and a wool needle. Finished measurements: - Single snood: Circumference approx 27 inches. Approx 17 inches height. - Double wrap snood: Circumference approx 65 inches. Approx 8 inches width. You can also purchase the snood ready made here. Terms: Please note this pattern is for your personal use only and to make as gifts. This pattern is an original design by Miss Knit Nat and the pattern or finished items are not to be distributed or sold in whole or in part. No returns or refunds on PDF patterns due to the nature of the digital product.

name: PDF knitting pattern - rib tassel scarf
description: Make your own super cosy chunky knit scarf. Made from a gorgeous rib stitch to make it extra warm and snuggly! Pattern contains variations for scarf with or without tassels, and also instructions on how to experiment with creating a wider scarf. Finished measurements: length approx 80 inches. Approx 8 inches width. This pattern is a great easy knit project. When you purchase the pattern you will be sent a link to download the PDF pattern automatically. Pattern is knitted up in super chunky yarn and you will also need a set of 10mm knitting needles and a wool needle. You can also purchase the scarf ready made here. Terms: Please note this pattern is for your personal use only and to make as gifts. This pattern is an original design by Miss Knit Nat and the pattern or finished items are not to be distributed or sold in whole or in part. No returns or refunds on PDF patterns due to the nature of the digital product.

name: Knitting kit - fingerless mitts
description: Super cosy and warm – this knitting kit contains instructions to make the gloves in either stocking stitch or moss stitch, and one ball of super soft chunky merino wool (Rowan Big Wool) all wrapped up in a tote bag. The finished mitts measure 7.5 inches length. Pattern is knitted up in super chunky yarn and you will also need a pair of 8mm needles for both styles of gloves and a wool needle. If you are making the stocking stitch mitts you will also need a pair of 7.5mm needles. You can also purchase the mitts ready made here. Terms: Please note this pattern is for your personal use only and to make as gifts. This pattern is an original design by Miss Knit Nat and the pattern or finished items are not to be distributed or sold in whole or in part.

name: Knitting kit - pom pom hat
description: Make your own Miss Knit Nat chunky pom pom hat! Super cosy and warm – this knitting kit contains instructions for hat with pom pom, or a longer beanie hat without pom pom, and two balls of super soft chunky merino wool (Rowan Big Wool) all wrapped up in a tote bag. This knitting kit makes a great beginner hat or first knitting in the round project - you could probably knit this up over a couple of evenings or a weekend (a few hours even if you really want to get those needles clicking!) The finished pom pom hat is 11 inches high including pom pom and is slightly slouchy fit. You will also need a set of 10mm double pointed needles, a pom pom maker (or circles of card!) and a wool needle. You can purchase the hat ready made here. Terms: Please note this pattern is for your personal use only and to make as gifts. This pattern is an original design by Miss Knit Nat and the pattern or finished items are not to be distributed or sold in whole or in part.

name: Knitting kit - moss stitch snood single
description: Make your own Miss Knit Nat moss stitch snood! Super cosy and warm – pattern contains instructions for single moss stitch snood, longer double wrap snood, and also double wrap snood with rib hem. The knitting kit will include two balls of super soft chunky merino wool (Rowan Big Wool) all wrapped up in a tote bag. This pattern is a perfect beginner snood pattern or first knitting in the round project. Pattern is knitted up in super chunky yarn and you will also need a 10mm circular needle and a wool needle. Finished measurements: circumference approx 27 inches. Approx 17 inches height. You can also purchase the snood ready made here. Terms: Please note this pattern is for your personal use only and to make as gifts. This pattern is an original design by Miss Knit Nat and the pattern or finished items are not to be distributed or sold in whole or in part.

name: Knitting kit - rib tassel scarf
description: Make your own super cosy chunky knit scarf. Super cosy and warm – this knitting kit contains instructions for the scarf, and four balls of super soft chunky merino wool (Rowan Big Wool) all wrapped up in a tote bag. Made from a gorgeous rib stitch to make it extra warm and snuggly! Pattern contains variations for scarf with or without tassels, and also instructions on how to experiment with creating a wider scarf. This knitting kit makes a great easy knit project. You will also need a set of 10mm knitting needles and a wool needle. Finished measurements: length approx 80 inches. Approx 8 inches width. You can also purchase the scarf ready made here. Terms: Please note this pattern is for your personal use only and to make as gifts. This pattern is an original design by Miss Knit Nat and the pattern or finished items are not to be distributed or sold in whole or in part.

name: knitting kit - moss stitch double wrap snood
description: Make your own Miss Knit Nat moss stitch snood! Super cosy and warm – pattern contains instructions for single moss stitch snood, longer double wrap snood, and also double wrap snood with rib hem. The knitting kit will include three balls of super soft chunky merino wool (Rowan Big Wool) all wrapped up in a tote bag. This pattern is a perfect beginner snood pattern or first knitting in the round project. Pattern is knitted up in super chunky yarn and you will also need a 10mm circular needle and a wool needle. Finished measurements: circumference approx 65 inches. Approx 8 inches width. You can also purchase the snood ready made here.
